text: Panagiota Riga (; born 8 February 1988) is a Cypriot footballer who plays for First Division club AC Omonia. She has been a member of the Cyprus women's national team. ==International career== Riga capped for Cyprus at senior level during the 2017 Aphrodite Cup, including a 1–2 loss to Latvia on 12 March 2017. ==References== Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Cypriot women's footballers Category:Cyprus women's international footballers Category:AC Omonia players
title: Panagiota Riga
